mapper.select: select rno, bno, userno, tbl_reply.regDate, comment, nickname from tbl_reply join tbl_member using(userno) where bno = #{bno} order by rno desc limit #{cri.amount} offset #{cri.offset}
select * from tbl_reply join tbl_member using(userno) where rno = #{rno}
